item.title: 贝森特（Bessent）抵制政府道德办公室（DOGE）的削减措施，因为这将使低收入贷款计划受到抨击
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统积极削减政府成本的议程正迫使他的财政部长在支持这一使命与努力保护数百万低收入美国人的重要金融生命线之间寻求平衡。【原文：President Donald Trump’s aggressive government cost-cutting agenda is forcing his Treasury chief to balance support for that mission with efforts to protect a crucial financial lifeline for millions of low-income Americans.】

item.title: 谷歌和苹果在欧盟大规模打击科技公司的行动中遭到双重指责
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司（Google）被警告必须遵守欧盟的大科技规则，否则将面临巨额罚款，这是对硅谷双管齐下的升级行动的一部分，有可能进一步激化与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的紧张关系。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google was warned to step in line with the European Union’s Big Tech rules or risk hefty fines as part of a two-pronged escalation against Silicon Valley that risks further inflaming tensions with US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 美国看起来很像中国
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 石油生产商 APA 裁员多达 15
item.description: APA 公司在全球范围内裁员约 300 人，成为最新一家通过裁员降低成本的石油生产商。【原文：APA Corp. cut about 300 employees globally as it becomes the latest oil producer to reduce costs by eliminating jobs.】

item.title: 谷歌在 iPhone 16e 发布数周后推出重新设计的售价 499 美元的 Pixel 9a
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司在苹果公司低端 iPhone 16e 上市数周后推出了重新设计的经济型 Pixel 手机，升级了芯片和电池续航时间。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google launched a redesigned version of its budget Pixel phone, upgrading the chip and battery life weeks after Apple Inc.’s lower-end iPhone 16e went on sale.】

item.title: 米莱的通胀奇迹因指数中的过时项目而失真
item.description: 每天早上，典型的阿根廷人都会买一份报纸，点燃一支香烟，然后一边翻阅报纸，一边吸着烟，然后从墙上的电话座上拿起电话拨打电话。【原文：Each morning, the typical Argentine buys a newspaper, lights up a cigarette and then, while leafing through the pages and puffing away, grabs the telephone from its perch on the wall to make a call.】

item.title: 瑞波公司的加林豪斯称美国证券交易委员会撤销了具有里程碑意义的加密货币案件
item.description: 瑞波公司（Ripple）表示，美国证券交易委员会对这家加密货币公司的诉讼已经结束，这是唐纳德-特朗普总统执政初期几周内放弃的几项执法行动中最新的一项。【原文：Ripple said the US Securities and Exchange Commission case against the crypto company has ended, the latest of several enforcement actions that have been abandoned during the early weeks of President Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: Pimco 支持的金融科技公司 Qualco 考虑 IPO 以推动扩张
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Qualco 集团正在考虑首次公开募股，因为这家希腊金融科技公司希望进一步扩大在欧洲和中东的业务。【原文：Qualco Group is considering an initial public offering as the Greek fintech company looks to further expand its operations in Europe and the Middle East, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲在推进国防建设的同时加强对钢铁行业的保护
item.description: 欧盟将加强对其钢铁工业的保护，试图保护这个对国防至关重要的行业免受关税、廉价进口产品和高能源价格的影响。【原文：The European Union will step up protection of its steel industry, as it tries to shield a sector that’s crucial for defense from tariffs, cheap imports and high energy prices.】

item.title: 哈格里夫斯-兰斯当（Hargreaves Lansdown）称英国人购买的英国国债数量创历史新高
item.description: 哈格里夫斯-兰斯当（Hargreaves Lansdown）的数据显示，上个月散户投资者抢购英国债券的数量创下了历史之最，因为他们希望利用历史上最高的收益率和税收优惠。【原文：Retail investors snapped up the most UK bonds on record last month, according to Hargreaves Lansdown, as they look to capitalize on historically high yields and a tax perk.】

item.title: 加拿大人口增长因打击临时居民而放缓
item.description: 由于移民人数减少，加拿大新增居民的速度是三年来最慢的，大流行病后的人口激增逐渐结束，这给经济造成了压力，也使公众对新移民的情绪变得低落。【原文：Canada added new residents at the slowest pace in three years due to falling immigration, winding down a post-pandemic population boom that strained the economy and soured public sentiment toward newcomers.】

item.title: 欧盟旨在加快资本市场监管计划的时间表
item.description: 欧盟承诺将在今年晚些时候加快提出对资本市场进行更统一监管的建议，因为欧盟正努力推进这一被视为对国防等部门提供资金日益重要的问题。【原文：The European Union pledged to accelerate the timeline for proposals on more unified supervision of capital markets to later this year as it tries to advance an issue seen as increasingly crucial to providing finance to sectors like defense.】

item.title: 瑞典财政部长警告 2025 年通胀将达不到目标
item.description: 瑞典财政部将今年的通胀率预测上调至 2.5%，称预计通胀率将略高于央行的目标水平。【原文：Sweden’s Finance Ministry raised its forecast for inflation this year to 2.5%, saying it is expected to be slightly higher than the central bank’s target level.】

item.title: 欧洲央行政策成本导致法国银行损失扩大
item.description: 法国银行在上一年获得一次性收益后，在 2024 年报告亏损扩大，并且继续消化近年来欧洲中央银行货币政策的快速变化。【原文：The Bank of France reported a widening loss in 2024 after booking one-off gains the previous year and as it continues to digest rapid changes in the European Central Bank’s monetary policy in recent years.】

item.title: 肯尼亚未能实现主要目标，未能通过国际货币基金组织的最终项目审查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，肯尼亚未能达到国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）一项计划对其进行最终审查的关键基准，因此丧失了约 8.5 亿美元的付款。【原文：Kenya failed to meet key benchmarks in its final review under an International Monetary Fund program, forfeiting a disbursement of about $850 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 金多斯称欧洲央行的利率路径尚未确定
item.description: 欧洲央行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，全球的不确定性意味着欧洲央行无法预先承诺借贷成本的走向。【原文：Global uncertainty means the European Central Bank can’t precommit on where borrowing costs will go, according to Vice President Luis de Guindos.】

item.title: 菲律宾希望印度加入 "战队 "对抗中国
item.description: 据一位东南亚国家的高级军事官员称，菲律宾希望印度加入一个由美国支持的新兴军事联盟，以抵制中国在印度洋-太平洋地区日益高涨的强硬态度。【原文：The Philippines wants India to join an emerging US-backed military alliance to push back against China’s rising assertiveness in Indo-Pacific, according to a top military official from the Southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 初创公司加入微软-黑岩 300 亿美元人工智能基金
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）是山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）的 OpenAI 公司的最大支持者，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Microsoft Corp., the biggest backer of Sam Altman’s OpenAI, and BlackRock Inc., which has an executive on the artificial intelligence startup’s board, are joining forces with one of his chief rivals.】

item.title: 美国银行称英国应回购长期吉尔债券以缓解债务压力
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的研究人员认为，英国政府应彻底改变债务管理方式，回购长期债券。【原文：The UK government should radically alter its approach to debt management and buy back long-dated bonds, according to researchers at Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 高盛、杰富瑞下调评级，奥本海默称 M&A 反弹存疑
item.description: 据奥本海默公司（Oppenheimer & Co.【原文：The boom in M&A activity that dealmakers on Wall Street had hoped for after Donald Trump’s return to the White House may never materialize, according to Oppenheimer & Co.】

item.title: StanChart 肯尼亚分公司专注于财富管理业务，利润率受到挤压
item.description: 渣打银行肯尼亚有限公司首席执行官 Kariuki Ngari 在接受采访时表示，下半年将重点发展财富、市场和交易业务。【原文：Standard Chartered Bank Kenya Ltd. will focus on growing its wealth, markets and transaction businesses in the second half of the year, Chief Executive Officer Kariuki Ngari said in an interview.】

item.title: 军舰制造商巴布科克希望在防务股上涨之际晋升英国富时 100 指数
item.description: 随着欧洲加大安全支出，国防类股票纷纷反弹，英国军舰制造商巴布科克国际集团（Babcock International Group Plc）将重新加入富时 100 指数。【原文：British warship maker Babcock International Group Plc is set to rejoin the FTSE 100 index amid a rally in defense stocks as Europe ramps up security spending.】

item.title: 夜视镜制造商成为欧洲国防事业的亿万富翁
item.description: 去年年底，克里斯蒂安-哈吉米纳斯（Christian Hadjiminas）对其军事装备公司的股价感到不满。这位前菲布罗-所罗门（Phibro-Salomon）商品交易商现在更开心了，也更富有了。【原文：Christian Hadjiminas was disgruntled with his military equipment company’s share price at the end of last year. The former Phibro-Salomon commodities trader is now happier — and richer.】

item.title: 美国关系恶化，摩根大通和富国银行抛售南非债券
item.description: 富兰克林资源公司（Franklin Resources Inc.）、摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）和富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）等机构投资者本季度纷纷抛售南非债券，造成资金外流，其速度为 5 月份大选前所未见。【原文：Franklin Resources Inc., JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Wells Fargo & Co. are among institutional investors that have dumped South African bonds this quarter, fueling outflows at a rate not seen since before elections in May.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税前日本贸易顺差回升
item.description: 在主要出口国担心与美国贸易失衡的高度不确定时期，日本上个月的贸易收支在多种信号交织的情况下重新转为顺差。【原文：Japan’s trade balance switched back into surplus last month amid several mixed signals — the value of shipments abroad grew while imports unexpectedly fell — during a period of high uncertainty for major exporters worried about imbalances with the US.】

item.title: 加拿大顶级电信公司警告贸易战将加剧无线设备挑战
item.description: 加拿大收入最大的电信公司警告说，长期的贸易战将拖累经济增长，而国内移民目标的下降已经阻碍了经济增长。【原文：Canada’s largest telecom company by revenue warned that a prolonged trade war will drag on economic growth, which was already hampered by a drop in domestic immigration targets.】

item.title: 飙升的医疗费用引发共和党对交易的反击
item.description: 得克萨斯州共和党人詹姆斯-弗兰克（James Frank）是一个小政府保守派，他以反对官僚主义为己任。但在医疗保健方面，这位北德克萨斯州的立法者对不断上涨的成本感到非常震惊，因此他希望州政府能加强对兼并的监督。【原文：Texas Republican James Frank is a small-government conservative who has made it his mission to fight bureaucracy. But when it comes to health care, the North Texas lawmaker is so alarmed by rising costs that he wants greater state oversight of mergers.】

item.title: 监督机构称 Paragon 间谍软件工具与加拿大警方有关
item.description: 据多伦多大学的网络安全研究人员称，加拿大一家执法机构涉嫌使用间谍软件入侵手机并窃听信息。【原文：A Canadian law enforcement agency is suspected to have used spyware designed to hack into mobile phones and eavesdrop on messages, according to cybersecurity researchers from the University of Toronto.】

item.title: 印度能源公司 Greenko 创始人获得私人贷款承诺
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度清洁能源生产商绿科能源控股公司（Greenko Energy Holdings）的创始人已获得至少五家贷款机构的承诺，他们将寻求8亿美元的私人信用贷款，用于收购该公司的股份。【原文：Founders of Indian clean energy producer Greenko Energy Holdings have received commitments from at least five lenders as they seek an $800 million private credit loan for a stake purchase in the firm, people familiar with the matter said.】
